org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.clamp

Interface ClampingFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdentityClampingFunction, RatingRangeClampingFunction

    @DefaultImplementation(value=IdentityClampingFunction.class)
public interface ClampingFunction

    Function for clamping user-item data, typically a preference or rating.

    Since:
    0.11

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double apply(long user, long item, double value)
      Clamp a value.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        double apply(long user,
           long item,
           double value)

        Clamp a value.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        item - The item ID.
        value - The value to clamp.
        Returns:
        The clamped value.
